content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "birch_stairs", "quantity": 42, "index": 14}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rail", "quantity": 64, "index": 24}, {"type": "pig_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}]
thought: I need to craft 6 diorite_slab, which requires placing 3 diorite in the crafting table. I will move the first diorite from slot 22 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_stairs", "quantity": 42, "index": 14}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rail", "quantity": 64, "index": 24}, {"type": "pig_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}]
thought: I have moved one diorite to the crafting table, so I now need to move the next diorite to the right of the first one. I will move the second diorite from slot 22 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "birch_stairs", "quantity": 42, "index": 14}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rail", "quantity": 64, "index": 24}, {"type": "pig_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}]
thought: I have moved two diorite to the crafting table, so I now need to move the final diorite to the right of the first two. I will move the third diorite from slot 22 to slot 3.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "birch_stairs", "quantity": 42, "index": 14}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rail", "quantity": 64, "index": 24}, {"type": "pig_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}]
thought: Now that the diorite are in the crafting table, I can craft the diorite_slab. I will move the diorite_slab from slot 0 to slot 11.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
